law.catch_line: Requirements for allowing off-site disposal of construction or demolition waste at sites of less than one acre.

text.section: The cabinet may waive the requirement of subsection (1)(b) of this section, that the hours of operation shall be posted, and the requirements of subsection (1)(c) and (d) of this section, if the cabinet determines that the area of land to be affected, the limited duration of the disposal operation, or the materials to be disposed of do not require imposition of these standards to assure the safety of the public.
This section shall not apply to beneficial reuse of industrial solid waste.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 1, effective April 9, 1992.
